text: @dcexaminer @brianstelter @GenFlynn People die EVERY day, regardless of pandemic or not. I never once heard you cry or mourn over them EVERY day. I did hear you go on & on & on over GenFlynn & Russian collusion, impeach, impeach EVERY day; obscuring incoming covid19. YOU ARE DESPICABLE SCUM!!! Take responsibility!
